about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Who are we?
about.story: Our story began with the social media posts of our travel-loving friends. For exactly 10 years, we have been personally experiencing boutique and special hotels all over Turkey, and we only share with you the places we trust and love.
about.what_is_yerini_ayir_text: Yerini Ayır is not a hotel booking site. We are an elite hotel discovery platform prepared so that you don't get lost among thousands of options. Our goal is not to make sales, but to recommend the most accurate experience to you.
about.our_goal_text: To discover the places preferred by those "in the know", not the crowds. To list only businesses with character, a story and spirit among thousands of hotels. To provide curation of real experience, not algorithms.
about.quote: "We work to present Turkey's tourism potential with a modern and reliable interface; to be the address that gives the most accurate answer to everyone who plans a trip and asks 'I wonder where I should stay?'."

guide.title: Places to Visit in Turkey & Secret Discovery Routes
guide.subtitle: Turkey's most special corners, local flavours and hidden paradises. Where would you like to explore?

locations.bodrum: An Aegean dream adorned with turquoise bays, white houses and bougainvillea.
locations.fethiye: Meeting point of Oludeniz, Butterfly Valley and the Lycian Way.
locations.sirince: Famous Aegean village with historical Greek houses, wines and nostalgic streets.
locations.sapanca: A peaceful getaway route in nature, by the lake and in the forest.
locations.cappadocia: A fairytale atmosphere with fairy chimneys, balloon tours and underground cities.
locations.istanbul: Where continents meet. History, culture, and Bosphorus views.
locations.turkey-guide: Practical tips, entry requirements, and itineraries for first-timers.
locations.antalya: The heart of the Turkish Riviera. Beaches, ancient ruins, and waterfalls.
